item.title: The finding of income level in different provinces in Canada
item.description: abstract We want to campar income level in different provinces. We use methods like graph and analyzing data. The key result is median income values can represnt living standard better tan mean income values. The conclusion is that people have different income levels in different provinces. library(tidyverse) ## ── Attaching packages ────────────────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.0 ── ## ✓ ggplot2 3.3.2 ✓ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✓ tibble 3.0.3 ✓ dplyr 1.0.2 ## ✓ tidyr 1.
